name: LeaderPhrases
description: Review and analyze user feedback from the latest product release to identify areas for improvement.

name: Tell me more about that
description: Collect and analyze customer feedback to identify common issues and areas for improvement.

name: Show genuine interest and curiosity in what others have to say. How can I help you?
description: Demonstrate genuine interest and curiosity by actively listening and asking thoughtful questions when interacting with others.

name: Demonstrate care and support for your team’s success. Let’s figure this out together
description: Hold regular meetings to discuss challenges and brainstorm solutions as a team, ensuring everyone's input is valued to drive collective success.

name: Encourage collaboration and shared problem-solving.  I hear what you’re saying
description: Host a workshop where team members can collaborate on shared problem-solving exercises designed to strengthen teamwork and shared understanding.

name: Confirm that you are actively listening.  What do you think we should do?
description: A task to ensure that the user feels heard by actively confirming understanding and proposing actionable steps.

name: Invite input and empower team members to share ideas.  I appreciate this
description: Organize regular sessions where team members can freely share ideas in a supportive environment. Encourage open dialogue and ensure all voices are heard to foster innovation and collaboration.

name: Express gratitude and acknowledge contributions.  Your effort made this happen
description: Acknowledge contributions by expressing gratitude and recognizing efforts that led to the project's success. This includes sending personalized thank you notes, public recognition, and celebrating milestones.

name: Recognize the team’s achievements and give them credit.  We need your voice
description: Acknowledge and publicly commend the team's accomplishments to boost morale and foster a culture of appreciation.

proposedSubTasks: Share recognition in a team meeting or platform

name: Encourage sharing of perspectives and ideas.  What did we learn here?
description: Foster an environment where team members feel comfortable sharing their perspectives and ideas openly.

name: Focus on growth and improvement rather than blame.  That was my mistake
description: Encourage a culture of learning and improvement by focusing on growth rather than assigning blame when mistakes occur.

name: Take responsibility and model accountability.  Show me how you would do it
description: Regularly review personal and team responsibilities, assess accountability, and address any gaps or issues proactively.

proposedSubTasks: Document lessons learned from past tasks

name: Encourage initiative and confidence in others.  What are your career goals?
description: Reflect on and document your career goals, then outline actionable steps to encourage initiative and confidence in others.

name: Show genuine interest in their growth and future.  I trust your judgment
description: Engage in discussions to understand and support their long-term goals and aspirations, offering guidance and resources where appropriate.

name: Empower them to make decisions and build confidence.
description: Conduct regular workshops to guide employees in making informed decisions and building their confidence through practical exercises and feedback.
